RelatedSentence: Paper Chase is JURIST 's real - time legal news service , powered by a team of 30 law student reporters and editors led by law professor Bernard Hibbitts at the University of Pittsburgh School of Law .
As an educational service , Paper Chase is dedicated to presenting important legal news and materials rapidly , objectively and intelligibly in an accessible format .
JURIST can not and does not provide legal advice .
